markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thoughtform Summoning](/Feats.aspx?ID=3666) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 25</row>

</column>

---

You can create a prototypical creature from the depths of your imagination instead of calling one from elsewhere. Whenever you summon a creature, you can choose to instead create a psychic construct of that creature. This grants it resistance to physical damage equal to half its level, weakness 5 to force and mental damage, and the ability to pass through enemies' spaces without needing to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) (though it can't end its turn in an occupied space).
name: Thoughtform Summoning
